answers.text:
Hi Eileen, 
Thank you for your question on payments in lieu of taxes. We have many great resources on this topic on the Knowledge Network. Here are a few of them that should help you answer your question on what different local governments around the country are doing to solve this problem. 
•    Here is a previously answered question on programs that other local governments that have many tax exempt entities in their community are putting in place. There are a variety of answers that should be helpful to you. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20849
•   This is a budget brief from Douglas County, Nevada that includes payment in lieu of property taxes. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/304078
•    Letter to Pennsylvania Budget and Finance Committee discusses the pros and cons of payment in lieu of property taxes programs and how they can be implemented. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/301741
I hope these resources are helpful to you in answering your question and if any other members have insight into this topic please share your experiences! We are always looking for more answers. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Eileen Stein
text: Our town has a large amount of property exempt from the tax roll due to religious and non-profit exemptions.  I am wondering if anyone has a similar situation and have you negotiated any kind of payment in-lieu of taxes from any of these institutions or organizations in your city?
title: Payments In-Lieu of Taxes
